attributes.action: Stop the BAA injunction which would see people being denied the right to protest at or near Heathrow airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BAA are trying to stop activists exercising their right to peaceful protest. This has to be stopped. Big business should not be allowed to dictate what rights people have.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the BAA injunction which would see people being denied the right to protest at or near Heathrow airport."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12994.asp

Prime Minister's Office
